;Xinhua News Agency, Tianjin, September 16th  The Second Vocational Skills Competition of the People's Republic of China on September 16th Opened in Tianjin. Li Qiang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Premier of the State Council, recently issued important instructions on the work of skilled personnel. The instructions pointed out: Skilled talents are valuable resources for implementing the strategy of strengthening the country through talent, employment priority strategy and innovation-driven development strategy. Holding a national vocational skills competition will provide a platform for skilled talents to display and compete in skills, which will help promote the formation of new trends in the era of skilled employment, skills development, and skills serving the country. All regions and departments must adhere to the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, fully implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party and the important instructions and requirements of General Secretary Xi Jinping, and in accordance with the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee, do a solid job in the work of skilled personnel and accelerate development Technical education, improve the lifelong vocational skills training system, improve the vocational skills competition system with Chinese characteristics, broaden development channels, improve remuneration levels, vigorously promote the spirit of model workers, labor spirit, and craftsmanship in the whole society, and strive to create a large-scale, reasonable structure, A team of skilled workers with excellent quality contributes to promoting high-quality development and comprehensively building a modern socialist country.

;

;State Councilor Chen Yiqin attended the opening ceremony to announce the opening and investigated the work of skilled talents. She emphasized that it is necessary to thoroughly implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on the work of skilled talents, implement the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee and the State Council, vigorously strengthen the construction of the team of skilled talents, and strengthen support for skilled talents in promoting high-quality development and comprehensively building a modern socialist country. .

;

;After the opening ceremony, Chen Yiqin visited the skills display and exchange area of ​​the competition and the manufacturing, transportation and other competition projects, and then went to the Advanced Technical School Affiliated to Tianjin Vocational and Technical Normal University and the WorldSkills Competition China (Tianjin) Research Center, investigates and understands the training of skilled talents in technical colleges, research and promotion of WorldSkills Competition, etc.

;

;She pointed out that strengthening the cultivation of skilled talents is the basis for expanding the team of skilled workers and promoting skilled employment. It is necessary to innovate the training system for skilled talents, improve the evaluation and incentive mechanisms for skilled talents, focus on strengthening the training of skilled talents in key areas such as manufacturing, solidly promote the reform and development of technical colleges, and constantly improve the setting of disciplines and majors and the way of training talents. It is necessary to continue to carry out large-scale and multi-level vocational skills training, widely carry out various vocational skills competitions, strengthen the combination of competition and training, and the mutual promotion of competition and learning, and continuously improve the level of training of skilled talents.

;Sunday, September 17, 2023
; ;

;Add power to small and micro enterprises and introduce financial resources to support the development of the real economy; establish and improve a risk prevention and control system to strengthen the fight against Controlling the "dam" of telecommunications network fraud... In the study and implementation of the theme education of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, the People's Bank of China firmly grasps the general requirements of "learning ideas, strengthening party spirit, emphasizing practice, and building new achievements", and implements the theme education Closely integrate with the implementation of the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee and the promotion of the central work of the People's Bank of China, in-depth study, extensive research, hard work, and multiple measures to achieve solid results.

;

;;Strengthen the theoretical arm and stabilize the rudder of thought;

;

;"Accounting Lecture Hall", "Accounting Salon" and "Erudition and Practicing"... This is the Accounting of the People's Bank of China A unique learning platform for themed education created by the Party Branch of the Finance Department.

;

;In order to promote the solid development of thematic education, the Accounting and Finance Department closely combined with its own actual situation and implemented the strategy of "reading a series of key books together, building a set of propaganda and education carriers, promoting a batch of grassroots surveys, and clarifying a package task list" "Four Ones" mechanism. In addition to self-study tasks, every party member of the party branch has a learning task.

;

;Since the launch of thematic education, the Party Committee of the People's Bank of China has made strengthening theoretical arming a top priority, giving full play to the role of leading cadres in leading and promoting learning, and continuously improving the learning consciousness and initiative of the majority of party members and cadres. Members of the party committee insist on learning one step first and studying one level deeper, carry out reading classes and concentrated seminar activities, and teach special party courses to party members and cadres in the system to continuously improve the effectiveness of learning. Through the "Three Meetings and One Lesson", theme party day activities and other carriers, each party branch of the head office has established mechanisms such as individual self-study, centralized learning, dedicated lectures, exchanges and research, to deeply study the worldview and methodology contained in the party's innovative theory.

;

;In order to strengthen policy guidance and work control, the Party Committee of the People's Bank of China established 7 roving guidance groups and 4 agency supervision groups to go down to the first batch of thematic education units (departments) for full coverage supervision, and to supervise the broad system Party members and cadres have worked hard to learn, understand and practice, and promote the solid and orderly development of thematic education.

;

;“Some party branches in your unit have not implemented timely follow-up on the relevant documents of learning theme education. I would like to remind you that your unit must further strengthen the daily management and supervision of the party branch’s study...” For units with insufficient timeliness and initiative in theoretical learning, the Third Circuit Steering Group of the Party Committee of the People's Bank of China issued work reminder letters in a timely manner to ensure that the theme education is in-depth and practical.

;

;;Go deep into the grassroots and build a solid foundation for business development;

;

;“Intellectual property rights can also be borrowed, and our design and research and development progress will be greatly accelerated.” Recently, Shanghai Zhifeng Automotive Technology Co., Ltd. applied for a credit loan of 1.415 million yuan on its mobile phone through the China Construction Bank "CCB Hui understand you" APP. Driven by the inclusive small and micro loan support tools of the People's Bank of China, China Construction Bank innovatively launched the "Shanke Loan" product for scientific and technological small and micro enterprises, using corporate talents, intellectual property and other factors to enhance credit and minimize the risk of enterprises. Interest costs.

;

;In June this year, the Monetary Policy Department of the People's Bank of China found through research that in recent years, the problem of expensive financing for small and micro enterprises has been significantly improved, but there are still problems such as poor policy transmission mechanisms. In order to increase support for corporate financing, the Monetary Policy Department guides financial institutions to make full use of monetary policy tools and guides bank funds to flow directly to enterprises.

;

;Since the launch of the theme education, the People's Bank of China has conscientiously implemented the five-character formula of "depth, practicality, detail, accuracy and effectiveness", carried out investigation and research throughout the system, issued work plans, strengthened research coordination, and clarified the investigation Key tasks and methodological steps of the research.

;

;The Party Committee of the People's Bank of China has studied and determined key research topics such as promoting high-quality economic development and RMB settlement of border trade. Members of the team went to many places to go deep into the masses, enterprises, and financial institutions, and discovered and understood the problems that are difficult to hear in the office. Real problems that are difficult to see have formed a batch of valuable and weighty research results.

;

;The first batch of units (departments) of thematic education formulated more than 700 research topics, conducted more than 2,800 surveys, sorted out and formed a list of transformation and application of research results, and solved problems on site, introduced policy measures, and improved work. mechanisms, risk warnings, etc., to effectively transform research results into actual results in promoting development and improving work.

;

;;Adhere to the original intention of serving the people and solve urgent problems and worries;

;

;“The elderly at home have difficulty moving and cannot go to the branch to activate their social security cards. What should I do?” Not long ago, Mr. Gao from Rushan City, Shandong Province dialed the Weihai Branch of the People's Bank of China. Mr. Gao's mother is ill in bed and cannot go to a bank branch to activate her social security card. The People's Bank of China immediately contacted its business bank, and at 7 a.m. the next day, bank branch staff went to the elderly person's home to handle the social security card activation business.

;

;Since the launch of thematic education, the People's Bank of China has resolutely implemented the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions and the Party Central Committee's decisions and arrangements, and has effectively solved a group of people's troubles, worries and worries. It further enhances the people's sense of access, happiness and security in financial services.

;

;Continuing to further promote the crackdown on telecommunications network fraud and crimes, the People's Bank of China cooperates with the Ministry of Public Security and other departments to prevent and crack down on telecommunications network fraud and rectification work, and guides banking financial institutions and non-bank payment institutions to establish and improve The system of "risk monitoring-timely processing-effective feedback-continuous optimization" continues to build a strong "dam" to combat and control telecom network fraud.

;

;The main responsible comrades of the People's Bank of China said that we must adhere to the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, thoroughly study and implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party, persist in learning, thinking, applying, unifying knowledge, belief and action, and focusing on The people have new expectations and requirements for financial services, and with a sense of responsibility that "always be assured", we strive to solve the urgent, difficult and anxious problems of the people in the financial field and better promote high-quality economic and social development.

;; Sun, 17 Sep 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 浙江凝聚合力办好杭州亚运会http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/17/nw.D110000renmrb_20230917_5-01.htm
;Sunday, September 17, 2023
; ;

;Walking into Gongshu Canal Sports Park in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, there are criss-crossing rivers and green trees, and citizens who are exercising are laughing and laughing. . Not far away, the jade cong-shaped gymnasium is eye-catching. “This used to be the urban village where my home is located, but it has changed a lot in recent years,” said citizen Zhang Dan.

;

;The transformation of urban villages into urban landmarks is due to Hangzhou’s ongoing urban renewal in preparation for the Asian Games.

;

;Asian Games flags, Asian Games video broadcasts, night light shows...all parts of Hangzhou have put on new "Asian Games-themed" clothes. On September 23, the 19th Asian Games will open in Hangzhou. Zhejiang has carried out three major improvements in "urban quality, urban governance, and urban civilization" across the province. Urban functions have gradually improved, people's livelihood and well-being have steadily improved, and the effects of the Asian Games have continued to amplify.

;

;At the feet are professional-level sports facilities, and above the head are viaducts that run vertically and horizontally - as the first embedded basketball park under a bridge in Zhejiang Province, the Hangzhou Basketball Park, which will be opened in September 2022, will transform the past urban management The "leftover materials" that are difficult to use have become the popular "golden corners and silver edges" of national fitness.

;

;Currently, 1,741 tasks in 59 categories of Hangzhou’s environmental quality improvement actions for the Asian Games have been completed, and efforts have been made to create four landscapes: “Beautiful Home”, “Smooth Traffic”, “Hangyun Streets” and “Hangzhou City Full of Flowers” , the city’s 39 entrances to the city, 139 Asian Games commuter roads and 200 important guarantee roads have been fully decorated; 2,763 communities (villages) have been comprehensively renovated and upgraded, and 71 city parks and 22 pocket parks have been built.

;

;The five Asian Games co-hosting cities, Ningbo, Shaoxing, Wenzhou, Huzhou and Jinhua, have successively completed and put into operation a number of major infrastructure projects, focusing on city gateways, transportation hubs, and venues surrounding the city. In April 2022, the main line of Shaoxing Metro Line 1 will be opened for operation, seamlessly connecting with the Hangzhou Metro; on September 16, the Fuxing Asian Games smart EMU train slowly drove out from Hangzhou East Station, connecting 6 Asian Games cities in series to serve the Asian Games. competition.

;

;As the Asian Games approach, many roads in Hangzhou have been transformed into "Asian Games digital lanes." During a recent pre-match drill, data from the Hangzhou Traffic Congestion Index real-time monitoring platform showed that the highest point of the congestion index during the morning peak that day was mild congestion, and it became basically smooth in less than half an hour. Leveraging the advantages of a "digital city", Hangzhou adjusts lane activation status in real time based on real-time commuting conditions on road sections and the operation of event vehicles to ensure smooth traffic for the Asian Games; it also customizes 125 "green wave belts" of Asian Games commuting routes to ensure the smooth operation of road traffic on the city side. .

;

;National participation will continue to polish the foundation of urban civilization. As representatives of Hangzhou’s volunteer service team, the “Martial Arts Aunts” have been even busier recently. "I can do cardiopulmonary resuscitation and hemostatic bandaging," said volunteer Yin Yongmei. Zhejiang University students have completed the volunteer service project training and the "Charming Hangzhou" competition drills, and are now full of confidence. Among the 37,600 volunteers for the Hangzhou Asian Games and Asian Paralympic Games, 96% came from 46 universities in Zhejiang.

;

;At present, Hangzhou has built more than 3,000 Asian Games urban volunteer service points, and the province's 1.42 million urban volunteers are ready.

;

;The main responsible comrade of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee stated that the Asian Games and the Asian Paralympic Games should be successfully held as a stage to demonstrate the effectiveness of the construction of "an important window to comprehensively demonstrate the superiority of the socialist system with Chinese characteristics in the new era", and to The world presents a sports and cultural event with "Chinese characteristics, Asian style, and splendid".

;; Sun, 17 Sep 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 托起“稳稳的幸福”http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/17/nw.D110000renmrb_20230917_6-01.htm
;Sunday, September 17, 2023
; ;

;The cause of disabled people is an important part of the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics, and supporting the disabled is an important symbol of social civilization and progress.

;

;In the past five years, with the great attention and cordial care of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, the cause of disabled people in my country has developed in an all-round way and reached a new level: the living conditions of disabled people have significantly improved, and their living standards have improved significantly. The level of equalization of basic public services continues to improve, the multi-level social security system is gradually improved, and the environment and conditions for disabled people to participate equally in social life are constantly optimized, supporting "stable happiness" for 85 million disabled people.

;

;;Systematic planning for the cause of persons with disabilities, and the leadership system for persons with disabilities further improved;

;

;On September 17, 2020, in Changsha, Hunan, General Secretary Xi Jinping presided over a grassroots meeting At the representative symposium, Yang Shuting from Chengbu Miao Autonomous County spoke as a representative of disabled entrepreneurs. In May 2019, Yang Shuting participated in the 6th National Commendation Conference for Model Self-improvement and Advanced Personnel Assistance, and General Secretary Xi Jinping cordially met with the delegates. Yang Shuting was very excited to see the General Secretary again after more than a year.

;

;“I am also very happy to meet you again and admire your spirit of continuous improvement!” General Secretary Xi Jinping said, “To continue to meet the people’s needs for a better life, we must protect the rights and interests of disabled people. The cause must continue to be promoted. The construction of barrier-free facilities you mentioned is a symbol of the civilization of a country and society, and we must attach great importance to it."

;

;In 2011, a car accident left Yang Shuting paraplegic at home. She owed more than 200,000 yuan for her medical treatment, and her life fell to the bottom. On the way to fight against fate, Yang Shuting did not give in. With support from all parties, she started a business producing footballs and bags, and also helped hundreds of poor families in her hometown get out of poverty.

;

;"Disabled people are a group with special difficulties and require special care and attention" "All construction projects must include the cause of disabled people, and constantly improve the system for protecting the rights and interests of disabled people" "Improved people can Live a wonderful life, and people with disabilities can also live a wonderful life"...

;

;The deep concern warms people's hearts, and their sincere instructions point the way. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has paid special attention to the cause of persons with disabilities and attached great importance to the cause of persons with disabilities, and has regarded the cause of persons with disabilities as an important part of the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics. General Secretary Xi Jinping issued a series of important instructions on how to do a good job in the work for persons with disabilities, put forward a series of clear requirements for the development of the cause of persons with disabilities, and profoundly elaborated on the values, status, role, goals, directions, important tasks and responsibilities of the development of causes for persons with disabilities in the new era. Require. Work for persons with disabilities has become an important part of the "Five-in-One" overall layout and the "Four Comprehensives" strategic layout, and the cause of persons with disabilities has further achieved coordinated development with the economy and society.

;

;The report of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China will include strengthening disability rehabilitation services in strengthening the construction of the social security system; the Fifth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China will improve the care service system and facilities for disabled people and improve the assistance to disabled people. and other social welfare systems were included in the "14th Five-Year Plan" recommendations; the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China once again emphasized accelerating the development of the cause of persons with disabilities; the report of the 20th National Congress of the Party clearly stated that "improve the social security system and care service system for persons with disabilities, promote Comprehensive development of the cause of persons with disabilities”.

;

;While carrying out systematic planning, our country’s leadership system for people with disabilities has also been further improved. At present, various places have generally established a leadership system and working mechanism for the cause of persons with disabilities under party committee leadership, government responsibility, social participation, and organizations for persons with disabilities to fully play their roles. The work for persons with disabilities has been included in the practical and annual assessments of party committees and governments on people's livelihood. Local governments’ work committees for persons with disabilities have strengthened overall planning and coordination, established and improved working rules, and explored systems such as annual work reports and key work inspections to form an efficient and collaborative work force. The Disabled Persons' Federation fully fulfills its representative, service and management functions and serves as a bridge between the Party and the government and persons with disabilities. Local finances have continued to increase investment in causes for persons with disabilities, and service resources for persons with disabilities have been effectively aggregated. Various localities have also actively carried out pilot projects for government purchase of services for persons with disabilities and established guiding catalogs and standards to significantly improve the management capabilities and service levels for persons with disabilities.

;

;;Securing the bottom line of people’s livelihood and weaving a dense basic livelihood security network for disabled people;

;

;“I am happiest when I increase my income and gain recognition through my own labor. Something!" Li Qin, a hearing-impaired person, said with a smile at the "Canyi Workshop" in Haishu District, Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province. Key bags, wallets and other handicrafts are placed in categories around the workbench. These are her newly made order products. In 2019, the Haishu District Disabled Persons' Federation established a cultural and creative product display and sales center for disabled people in Nantang Old Street, a local tourist attraction. This brought Li Qin a stable income of several thousand yuan per month and helped her family get out of poverty. "I look forward to selling handicrafts to more people, and I believe that the future will be better and better." Li Qin is full of confidence.

;

;In the past, poverty was a huge obstacle that restricted the majority of disabled people from living a well-off life. Getting rid of poverty was a strong expectation of the majority of poor disabled people. Due to reasons such as limited labor capacity and low educational level, poor disabled people often face more difficulties in escaping poverty and require more efforts.

;

;During the "Thirteenth Five-Year Plan" period, the cause of disabled people has made historic achievements, and the goal of "building a moderately prosperous society in all respects by 2020, with no less than one person with disabilities" has been achieved as scheduled. More than 7 million registered poor people with disabilities have been lifted out of poverty as scheduled, creating a miracle in the history of human poverty reduction. In order to consolidate and expand the results of poverty alleviation for disabled people, various localities and departments have continued to work hard to strengthen dynamic monitoring and assistance of disabled people who are prone to return to poverty and to ensure that no return to poverty occurs.

;

;Neat and beautiful yard, spacious and bright nursing room, happy and bright smiles... Brothers Pang Jian and Pang Qiang (both pseudonyms) see each other every day at Beihai Disabled Care Service Center in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region People take the initiative to say hello, and their daily life is taken care of by the center staff.

;

;“Now I don’t have to spend all day taking care of them. I can go out to work to earn money and improve my family’s life.” The brothers’ sister told reporters that both brothers were severely mentally disabled. Afraid to communicate with others. In 2021, the brothers entered the Beihai Disabled Care Service Center and received round-the-clock care. The brothers gradually became cheerful and lively from being withdrawn and introverted. "I feel particularly relieved to see that their lives are getting better and better!"

;

;While solving the problem of "poverty due to disability", relevant departments have also introduced a series of measures to further improve the social security system for disabled people , the pension insurance system, the medical insurance system, etc. are gradually improved, the number of insured persons and the proportion of insured persons are continuously increased, and the basic livelihood security network for persons with disabilities is developed. All localities have accelerated the construction of care service systems for disabled people and improved the quality of care services, which has greatly eased the care pressure on families of disabled people and provided an effective way for disabled people to improve their lives and develop in an all-round way. By the end of 2022, the number of disabled people participating in the basic pension insurance for urban and rural residents in my country reached 27.617 million, 12.093 million disabled people received pensions, and there were 8,906 institutions at all levels and types providing care services for disabled people.

;

;;Improve the care service system and help disabled people participate in social life equally;

;

;“Pick up all the straw and tie it with ropes of these colors. , and then weave the pattern into a hammer." The straw and silk threads fly back and forth in the hands of the disabled, turning into beautiful and durable brooms, hammers, hangings and ornaments. Recently, the Chengde Disabled Persons' Federation of Hebei Province organized practical skills training for disabled people at the Pingquan Employment and Entrepreneurship Incubation Center for Disabled Persons. Dozens of trainees learned knitting techniques under the guidance of teachers. Since this year, Chengde City has promoted a targeted disability assistance service project and has benefited more disabled people through a series of measures such as organizing diversified vocational skills training and relay funding for disabled students.

;

;Serving the disabled is the basic function of the Disabled Persons' Federation. Services for the disabled are related to tens of millions of disabled families, which reflects the party and the country's care for the people in need. Over the past five years, our country has continuously improved the care service system for disabled people, and the quality and efficiency of services for disabled people have been further improved.

;

;Recently, more than 3,800 undergraduate freshmen at Tsinghua University have enrolled. At the scene, a boy in a wheelchair attracted the attention of many people. His name is Cheng Zimo, a freshman majoring in mechanics, aviation and power. "Love makes me grow, and adversity makes me fly!" Although he has been tortured by illness since childhood, thanks to the development of integrated education and the care and help from all walks of life, he has never given up his desire for knowledge and relied on his tenacious perseverance to overcome ordinary people. Despite unimaginable difficulties, he was admitted to Tsinghua University with excellent results.

;

;Continuously improve the level of health services for disabled people and strengthen disability prevention; special education continues to develop, and the educational rights and interests of disabled people are guaranteed; improve the quality of employment for disabled people and promote their full employment; promote culture and sports for disabled people The cause is booming and the lives of disabled people are becoming more colorful... Through the unremitting efforts of Disabled Persons' Federation organizations at all levels and relevant departments, the urgent, difficult and anxious problems of each disabled group have been solved, which has significantly improved the health, education and quality of disabled people. Quality of Life.

;

;“Since the establishment of this barrier-free garden, we often come here to get together, and we can also carry out various outdoor activities like able-bodied people, and our lives have become richer and better!” Nanjing City, Jiangsu Province Xuanwu Lake Barrier-free Garden, a blind tourist said happily.

;

;Intelligent voice prompts, handrails, Braille signs... carefully designed barrier-free facilities create a safer and more comfortable outdoor activity place for disabled people. As the breeze blew, a group of visually impaired runners came running along the trail. Blind masseur He Longhua said that they come here to run every Sunday morning. "The barrier-free access is very safe and gives us peace of mind."

;< p>;Environment is safe and life is filled with love. On September 1 this year, the "Barrier-free Environment Construction Law of the People's Republic of China" came into effect. As my country's specialized law on barrier-free environment construction, this law will enable disabled people to participate in and integrate into social life equally, fully and conveniently. Promote all members of society to share the fruits of economic and social development and provide a solid legal guarantee.

;

;The Marrakech Treaty has come into effect in our country, further guaranteeing the equal access to culture and education for people with dyslexia; continuing to strengthen and improve travel services for people with disabilities, and improving travel convenience for people with disabilities; providing services for people with severe disabilities and severe disabilities Implement barrier-free transformation of people's homes to effectively solve the difficulties in the home life of disabled people; promote the acceleration of barrier-free transformation of websites and mobile applications so that disabled people can better experience the benefits of informatization... In recent years, my country's barrier-free environment construction The achievements are remarkable, the concept of barrier-free is deeply rooted in the hearts of the people, and the barrier-free environment has been greatly improved.

;

;“The Chinese Dream is a national dream, a national dream, a dream for every Chinese, and a dream for every friend with a disability.” Under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, the disabled people The cause of humankind will surely create a new situation in the new era and new journey, and the majority of disabled people will also usher in a happier and better tomorrow.

;Our newspaper, Beijing, September 16th  (Reporter Yu Sinan) The reporter recently learned from the China Association for Science and Technology: Since its construction was launched in 2012, my country's modern science and technology museum system has served more than 1 billion offline public visitors, playing a unique role in promoting fair and inclusive science popularization and improving the scientific quality of the entire population.

;

;In 2012, the China Association for Science and Technology launched the construction of a modern science and technology museum system. After more than 10 years of development, a "five-in-one" science popularization infrastructure covering the whole country has been built with 446 standard physical science and technology museums, 657 mobile science and technology museums, 1,764 science popularization caravans, 1,124 rural middle school science and technology museums, and China Digital Science and Technology Museum. system.

;

;The construction of physical science and technology museums ushered in new progress. The national standard-compliant physical science and technology museums have achieved full coverage at the provincial level, with a coverage rate of 65.9% in prefecture-level cities and more than 220 county-level science and technology museums. From 2013 to 2022, the national standard-compliant physical science and technology museums served the offline public for more than 520 million people.

;

;New breakthroughs have been achieved in the co-construction and sharing of mobile science popularization resources. In order to solve problems such as insufficient resources at the grassroots level, we promote the construction of a mobile science popularization resource library, gather science popularization resources, and provide "order-based" services to the grassroots level. The mobile science and technology museum regional exhibition model has been successfully piloted in 106 county-level administrative regions in 11 provinces, helping more than 20 counties and cities to establish science and technology museums, providing a carrier for improving grassroots organizational capabilities. The science popularization caravan has entered the fields and traveled approximately 54.653 million kilometers.

;应中华人民共和国国务院总理李强邀请，柬埔寨王国首相洪玛奈亲王于2023年9月14日至16日对中华人民共和国进行正式访问。访问期间，习近平主席亲切会见洪玛奈首相，就构建新时代中柬命运共同体及共同关心的国际和地区问题深入交换意见，为中柬关系未来发展指明了方向。李强总理同洪玛奈首相举行会谈，全国人大常委会委员长赵乐际会见洪玛奈首相。

;

;一、双方高度评价建交65年来中柬关系取得的长足发展，认为由两国历代领导人精心培育的中柬“铁杆”友谊历久弥坚，强调无论国际风云如何变幻，中柬将坚定不移发展世代友好，坚定不移深化互利合作，坚定不移携手构建高质量、高水平、高标准的新时代中柬命运共同体，为构建人类命运共同体树立典范。双方积极评价中柬建交65周年和“中柬友好年”系列庆祝活动成效，愿进一步弘扬中柬传统友谊，让中柬友好代代相传。

;

;二、双方重申尊重并支持对方根据各自国情选择的发展道路。柬方高度评价新时代十年中国取得的伟大发展成就，认为中国式现代化为人类实现现代化提供新路径，给柬埔寨带来新机遇，相信中国将全面建成社会主义现代化强国，实现第二个百年奋斗目标，以中国式现代化全面推进中华民族伟大复兴。中方高度评价柬埔寨经济社会发展成就，相信在西哈莫尼国王庇佑下，以洪玛奈首相为首的柬新政府将领导国家建设取得更大发展，人民生活更加美好，为维护地区乃至世界的和平与繁荣发挥更重要作用。

;

;三、中方重申坚定支持柬埔寨维护国家主权、安全、发展利益，坚决反对外部势力干涉柬埔寨内政。

;

;柬方重申恪守一个中国原则，承认中华人民共和国政府是代表全中国的唯一合法政府，台湾是中国领土不可分割的一部分；强调台湾问题是中国内政，任何外部势力无权干涉。柬方反对任何利用台湾问题干涉中国内政、围堵遏制中国的图谋，反对任何形式的“台独”，坚定支持中国政府为实现国家统一所作的一切努力，绝不同台湾发展任何形式的官方关系。

;

;双方坚决反对将人权问题政治化和搞双重标准，坚决反对任何国家以人权和民主为借口干涉别国内政。双方将加强在反干涉、防范“颜色革命”领域合作。

;

;四、双方一致同意保持高层战略沟通，就中柬关系及共同关心的重大问题加强协调配合。双方同意发挥好中柬政府间协调委员会统筹作用，落实好《中华人民共和国政府和柬埔寨王国政府关于构建新时代中柬命运共同体行动计划（2024—2028）》。双方将充分发挥中国全国人大、全国政协同柬埔寨国会、参议院和党际等渠道作用，落实好《中国共产党与柬埔寨人民党交流合作备忘录》，深化治国理政交流与密切合作，丰富新时代中柬命运共同体内涵。

;五、双方同意推动“一带一路”倡议同柬埔寨“五角战略”对接，围绕中柬“钻石六边”合作架构，深化中柬全面战略合作伙伴关系，实现两国高质量、可持续的共同发展。

;

;深化两国检验检疫合作，探索推动通过“单一窗口”实现跨境信息互联互通，深化动植物检疫和食品安全监管合作，加快商签柬优势农食产品输华检疫准入议定书。

;

;——发挥两国政府经贸合作委员会的指导作用，支持两国企业开展互利共赢的贸易投资合作。落实好中柬自贸协定，借助双边电商合作机制和中国国际进口博览会、中国进出口商品交易会、中国国际消费品博览会、全球数字贸易博览会、中国—东盟博览会等平台，充分挖掘潜力，提升柬商品在华竞争力。高质量实施《区域全面经济伙伴关系协定》（RCEP），推动中国—东盟自贸区3.0版谈判。柬埔寨支持中国香港加入RCEP。

;

;——保持两军高层交往，拓展两军有关业务部门之间、军兵种之间的交往，深化在教育训练、联演联训、医疗卫勤、扫雷等领域务实合作，加强多边协调配合。

;

;不断深化两国国家及地方警察在打击跨境赌博、电信诈骗等执法领域的务实合作和能力建设，开展“一带一路”重大项目安保合作。

;

;——中方愿一如既往支持柬埔寨经济发展和民生改善，推动全球发展倡议在柬埔寨落地见效，实施好柬埔寨乡村道路、桥梁、供水、学校、医疗等项目。柬方感谢中方提供的大力支持。

;

;柬埔寨重申热烈欢迎中国游客并保证提供高质量服务与安全。双方同意加强两国文化和旅游主管部门沟通，推动落实中柬文化合作执行计划，鼓励两国旅游企业共同打造旅游产品、开发人力资源，相互支持旅游市场推广和机制建设。继续开展柬埔寨吴哥古迹王宫遗址保护修复项目，推进柏威夏寺及其他文化遗产的保护修复合作。支持双方空运企业根据市场需求增加中柬航班，为双边经贸合作与人员往来提供便利。

;

;继续支持柬优秀青年来华学习深造。发挥柬中友好青年之家增进中柬青年交流、加强人才培养合作的平台作用。推动在柬孔子学院建设和柬中文教学高质量发展。在“中国—柬埔寨职业教育合作联盟”框架下推进职业教育合作，推进职业技能等级标准互认，中方将继续为柬学生提供中国政府奖学金。

;

;深化中医药及传统医学等卫生领域交流合作，加快推进中柬中医药中心建设，中方将长期向柬派遣中国医疗队（中医）。

;

;双方积极支持开展各种形式的民间交往，推动两国民间组织深化文明互鉴和民生项目合作，切实增进民心相通。

;

;六、双方愿共同维护以联合国为核心的国际体系、以国际法为基础的国际秩序、以联合国宪章宗旨和原则为基础的国际关系基本准则，反对霸权主义和强权政治，反对一切形式的单边主义，反对搞针对特定国家的排他性小圈子。双方将致力于构建新型国际关系，携手推动构建人类命运共同体。

;

;双方愿共同维护世贸组织基本原则和核心价值，支持世贸组织进行必要改革，特别是恢复两级审理的、有约束力的争端解决机制正常运转。双方作为发展中国家，愿在世贸组织框架下加强合作，共同维护发展中成员合法权益，推动世贸组织更好发挥作用。

;

;双方同意坚持真正的多边主义，柬方赞赏中国在促进全球和平与发展发挥的重要建设性作用，愿积极参与全球发展倡议合作，加快落实联合国2030年可持续发展议程。柬方支持全球安全倡议和全球文明倡议，愿同中方开展全球安全治理，实现共同、综合、合作、可持续安全，弘扬和平、发展、公平、正义、民主、自由的全人类共同价值。

;

;双方重申践行开放的区域主义，携手共建和平、安宁、繁荣、美丽、友好“五大家园”，深化中国—东盟全面战略伙伴关系，构建更为紧密的中国—东盟命运共同体。同意加强澜沧江—湄公河合作，推动建设更为紧密的澜湄国家命运共同体。

;

;七、双方认为，在中国与东盟国家共同努力下，南海局势总体保持稳定，呼吁有关各方继续全面有效落实《南海各方行为宣言》，深化海上合作，在协商一致基础上早日达成实质、有效的“南海行为准则”，将南海建设成为和平之海、友谊之海、合作之海，任何利用南海问题破坏地区和平与互信的图谋注定无法得逞。

;

;八、双方对洪玛奈首相访华成果表示满意。洪玛奈首相衷心感谢中国领导人和中国人民给予的热情友好接待，邀请中国领导人适时访问柬埔寨。

;

;访问期间，双方签署《中华人民共和国政府和柬埔寨王国政府关于构建新时代中柬命运共同体行动计划（2024—2028）》以及多份合作文件，涵盖“工业发展走廊”、“鱼米走廊”、基础设施、数字经济、绿色发展、检验检疫、林业和野生动植物、发展合作等领域。

;; Sun, 17 Sep 2023 05:56:03 +0800 02版要闻 - 中国“天宫”空间站举行非洲青少年画展http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/17/nw.D110000renmrb_20230917_3-02.htm
;2023年09月17日星期日
; ;

;日前，“我的梦想上太空——中国航天员与非洲青少年连线”暨非洲青少年“我的梦想”主题绘画作品大赛颁奖仪式在北京举行。参与视频连线的非洲青少年纷纷表示，此次活动激发起他们探索浩瀚宇宙的好奇心，希望能为促进非中友好合作贡献一份力量。

;

;;“感受到非洲青年的蓬勃朝气和人文情怀”;

;

;在距离地球400多公里的中国“天宫”空间站，一场别开生面的画展在这里举行。色彩缤纷的画作，展现出创意与巧思。

;

;今年3月，中非合作论坛中方后续行动委员会秘书处、中国载人航天工程办公室和部分中国驻非洲国家使领馆共同举办了非洲青少年“我的梦想”主题绘画作品大赛，共有来自42个非洲国家的超过2000幅作品参赛。5月底，来自阿尔及利亚、刚果（金）、埃及、马达加斯加、马里、毛里求斯、尼日利亚、索马里、南非和津巴布韦10个非洲国家青少年的画作获得一等奖“天和”奖，并跟随神舟十六号载人飞船抵达中国空间站。9月13日，这些作品在“天宫”空间站的天和核心舱展出。

;

;神舟十六号乘组3名航天员景海鹏、朱杨柱、桂海潮在空间站通过视频连线，向地球上的观众展示并介绍这10幅绘画作品。

;

;身着蓝色工作服的朱杨柱看着航天员主题的画作说：“这幅作品展示了非洲青少年对载人航天事业的热情，也让我对未来中非航天合作充满信心。”他表示，探索未知宇宙、发展航天技术是人类的共同事业，离不开包括非洲国家在内的世界各国通力合作。“我们衷心希望，中外航天员一道，共同为人类探索宇宙作出更大的贡献。”

;

;桂海潮微笑着解说，如同在教室里讲课。“画作中的女孩是你吗？”他与在地面上的阿尔及利亚少年哈吉尔直接对话。“这个女孩沉浸在对浩瀚星空的想象中，我从画中感受到了思想的力量。我时常看向空间站的舷窗外，宇宙正如你画的那般深邃，有太多的未知等待人类探索。”

;

;“玛斐科朋友，你好！”景海鹏与来自津巴布韦的玛斐科打招呼，称赞她的画色彩鲜艳，充满生机活力。“你在介绍中写到，你的梦想是成为非洲最棒的建筑设计师，所有人不论贫富都能在你设计的大楼里安居乐业。我为你点赞！通过你的作品，我感受到非洲青年的蓬勃朝气和人文情怀。祝你们梦想成真！”景海鹏诚挚地邀请非洲朋友去中国旅行，走一走，看一看。

;

;;“未来的科学家和航天员将在他们中产生”;

;

;在北京和中非共和国、科摩罗、埃及、赤道几内亚、肯尼亚等8个非洲分会场，获奖的非洲画家和非洲青少年在视频连线时，多次热烈鼓掌，表达激动之情。

;

;“空间站里可以种菜吗？”“中国航天员总说的'感觉良好'是一种什么样的具体感受？”“航天事业对国家发展有哪些帮助？”“太空中能不能看到非洲的刚果河？”……两次执行载人飞行任务、中国首位在轨时间超过200天的“英雄航天员”陈冬在北京主会场与非洲青少年视频连线，回答了许多充满想象力的问题。

;

;肯尼亚学生梅丽莎·万加拉的绘画作品获得二等奖，参与这次活动点燃了她的太空梦。“中国航天员说可以在太空种菜，我深受鼓舞，也想在太空研究农业、种植粮食，帮助消除贫困和饥饿。”

;

;戈德温·吉姆斯是一名教师。她说，非洲学生对太空充满向往，这次活动会让更多非洲学生对科学产生兴趣，努力学习各种知识，“未来的科学家和航天员将在他们中产生”。

;

;“我住在机场附近，每天看着飞机起飞、降落，让我对飞行和天空满怀梦想。”北京会场里，获得“天和奖”的马达加斯加青年拉苏隆贾图武手捧“天宫”空间站模型说，“来中国参加颁奖典礼，实现了我的心愿。我的绘画在空间站里展出，我特别激动和自豪。”

;

;来华履新不久的突尼斯驻华大使阿拉比出席了此次活动。他表示：“非洲的梦想飞到浩瀚宇宙，这次活动为非洲青少年与中国航天员交流提供了宝贵机会。非洲是一个非常年轻的大陆，青年人的梦想和能量是解决非洲问题的希望。期待更多非洲青年能参加这样的交流活动。”

;

;;“非中在航天技术领域合作日益密切”;

;

;中国与非洲在航天领域的合作不断深化，成为中非合作新亮点，现代航天科技在促进非洲国家经济社会发展，惠及非洲人民生产生活方面发挥着越来越大作用。

;

;中非合作论坛第八届部长级会议通过的《达喀尔行动计划（2022—2024年）》提出，双方将加强航天技术领域合作，推动非洲航天技术应用和基础设施建设。“非中在航天技术领域合作日益密切。”中非合作论坛非方共同主席国塞内加尔驻华大使锡拉表示，不久前，非中卫星遥感应用合作中心正式成立就是合作的新成果。设在中国、尼日利亚和摩洛哥的联合国附属空间科技教育区域中心，以及总部设在埃及的非洲航天局正成为非中合作的重要平台，“一带一路”航天创新联盟推动中国与非洲高校之间加强交流合作，助力非洲地区航天人才培训教育工作。本次活动是航天科普教育新模式的良好探索。

;

;近年来，中国充分发挥卫星遥感技术和资源优势，与13个非洲国家相关机构及区域组织签署了卫星数据应用合作谅解备忘录，向非洲23个国家提供了近4万景高分辨率中国自然资源遥感卫星数据，并举办了多次技术交流培训，有效提升非洲国家卫星遥感应用能力，为进一步深化中非卫星遥感应用合作奠定了良好基础。

;

;此次活动是中国一直以来同非洲真诚分享发展成果和发展机遇的又一例证。参与活动的外交部非洲司司长吴鹏表示，青少年是国家的未来和希望，也是中非合作的生力军。他们对美好生活的向往、对中非关系发展的追求，是中非传统友谊不断传承和发展的源源动力。中方愿以落实“中非人才培养合作计划”为主线，支持非洲培养面向治理能力现代化、经济社会发展、科技创新增效、民生福祉改善的各领域人才，为非洲青少年追梦、逐梦、圆梦创造更加有利的条件，提供更加广阔的空间。

;
